title: GMOA to meet with President
content: The Government Medical Officersâ€™ Association (GMOA) is due to meet President Gotabaya Rajapaksa later today (24) to place their grievances before him.Doctors' salary discrepancies and other issues relating to the national salaries policy and any breaches, transfers and shortage of medicines are due to be discussed, Assistant Secretary of the GMOA  Dr. Naveen de Zoysa said.He alleged salaries policy breaches that threaten the entire public service and its users, and urged that an encouraging environment be stimulated for public sector professionals so that they remain in the service.
